title: How are we able to store information digitally? - Quora

response.answer_text: Data storage is in a digital machine, readable on any medium and is called digital data. Digital data can be contrasted with analog signals which behave in a continuous manner, and with continuous functions such as sounds, images, and other measurements. Digitizing information is the process of converting information into digital form. Digitizing information is the process of converting information into digital form. It is converted into sequences of 0's and 1's (binary language) that can be interpreted by other computer systems. Software engineers can actually read binary 1’s and 0’s of 12 units each, in digital sequences. (that’s me)
